title: Mc点启动游戏没有反应,有错误报告
author: xbjyuan
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 14-8-9 下午5:00
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated

可是我更新惹！ AMD催化剂 13.1
